```{r}
h2018 <- read.csv("happiness2018.csv",
                  header = T,
                  sep = ",",
                  colClasses = c()
                    encoding = "utf-8"
                 )
```

```{r}
colnames(h2018) <- c("Classement", "Pays", "Score", "PIB_habitant", "Support_social", 
    "Esper_vie", "Liberte_choix_vie", "Generosite", "Confiance")
```

```{r}
dim(h2018)
```

```{r}
mod1 <- lm(Score ~., data = h2018[,3:8])
```

```{r}
summary(mod1)
```

```{r}
str(h2018)
```
